shortDescription: This website is about independent service provider...
shortDetails: This project has nice Login, LogOut, Register, Verify Email, Reset Password Email system that has been done with the firebase
It has a Dashboard , Admin can manage all products, all order and add Product , admin can delete any user and give admin power to any user.
And also users can order  products, If the user wants to cancel  her/his order, and a simple way to pay.
